hero_image.alt: Hero image for Calibrations in 2026: Mastering Metrology Maturity and Risk-Based Asset Management

image_prompt: A high-resolution, professional photo of a diverse team of maintenance professionals in a modern, clean industrial manufacturing setting. A female technician in a white hard hat, safety glasses, and a high-visibility vest is standing next to a large, complex stainless steel pump system. She is holding a rugged industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device). A male colleague, also in full PPE, stands nearby, gesturing toward a digital sensor integrated into the machinery. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a high-tech, "Industry 4.0" atmosphere. The shot is a full-body or medium-wide shot, showing the scale of the industrial environment. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or clothing.
